title: Error /libATen.so.1: undefined reference to `__cxa_throw_bad_array_new_length'
body_html:
PyTorch GitHub Issues Guidelines

  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • PyTorch version: Install from source
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): Conda
  • Python version: 3.5
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.1/cudnn 7.0.5
  • GPU models and configuration: TitanX Pascal
  • GCC version (if compiling from source): g++-4.9

In addition, including the following information will also be very helpful for us to diagnose the problem:

  • A script to reproduce the bug. Please try to provide as minimal of a test case as possible.
python setup.py install
  • Error messages and/or stack traces of the bug

cd aten
mkdir build
cd build
cmake ..
make VERBOSE=1 -j32

Context around what you are trying to do: I want to install pytorch from source. This issue looks come from build ATen package. I have tried to go this folder and build it but still not work. This is what I tried

cd aten
mkdir build
cd build
cmake ..
make VERBOSE=1 -j32
